Articles.Content:
Hello Avera9eJoe here I suggest updating the wiki's part list sooner as I find myself checking the list of parts often when an update comes out and find the list and statistics updated as much as a week after the update comes out.

Anyone else agree?
The Wiki is maintained by volunteers and they need time to work on this stuff, they are doing the best they can
Okay that's what I've been thinking recently. Go volunteers go!

Maybe those people who get the updates early (unfairly since we are all testers) should consider adding part descriptions etc. since they're not spoiling anything (since they are making videos or whatever)
